column3: paragraphs,  we  are  of  the  considered  opinion  that  the  there  is  no  valid
reason  to  "upset  trial  findings  of fact  that  have  evidentiary  support"  and  for
that  reason  the  appeal  of  the  1st  and  2nd  Appellants  are  dismissed  by
affirming the conviction and sentence imposed on them.

column4: The relevant High Court is directed to comply with the provisions of

column3: Section 303(4) of the Code of Criminal Procedure Act No. 15 of 1979.
